column5: That didn't seem like a smart idea in the first place.  Is that ever done by any rescue org?
to quote Forrest Gump......stupid is as stupid does

I dont think we have to worry about calling this guy for a tow...seems like he took care of any additional business.....you know...with his helicopter sitting at the bottom of the lake and all....LOL.
WOW! That is amazing and stupid all in the same.  Easton
Maybe the helicopter needed help landing
Thanks for sharing, it's amazing how people can think "hey, I got an idea", and not see the potential consequences.  It's even more amazing to have a camera ready to capture these occurances.  RB
At least he had the common courtesy to create an new artificial reef with his helicopter!  I wonder if the GPS points are available! HH
LOL - Thats what I was thinking! - Obviously the cameraman is on a different boat - why not use that boat to tow them in?  HMMMMMMM........................   Don
I think he needed a longer length of rope.
ya gotta wonder sometimes.... was that a Sea King helicopter?
I remember seeing that clip before and I believe that was supposed to be a shoot for a movie but the copter wasn't supposed to crash.
